title: TASK_PERFORM_SEQUENCE_LOCALLY
content:
0x8C33220C8D78CA0D// TaskPerformSequenceLocally
void TASK_PERFORM_SEQUENCE_LOCALLY(Ped ped, int taskSequenceId);Parameters:ped: The ped to perform the sequence ontaskSequenceId: The sequence to performFor an example on how to use this please refer to [OPEN_SEQUENCE_TASK](#_0xE8854A4326B9E12BOld name:  _TASK_PERFORM_SEQUENCE_LOCALLY
codeBlocks:
// TaskPerformSequenceLocally
void TASK_PERFORM_SEQUENCE_LOCALLY(Ped ped, int taskSequenceId);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for TASK_PERFORM_SEQUENCE_LOCALLY
TaskPerformSequenceLocally(ped, 0)
